name: Dungeon Dash (duketran1996, MateoC, Xi Peng)
description:
Duc Tran (dt2259)

Mateo Castro (MC7212)

Xi Peng

Press ASWD to move the character.

Press Spacebar to activate flying power.

Press H to shoot bullet.

Press U to use the ultimate.

Collect health potion and mana to stay alive.

Collect coins for purchase upgrade.
